name: Keep Rollin!
description:
The cube with endless energy is inexorably rolling along the road and you will have to control the cube! Make it so that he could ride as far as possible and set your own record. This game will require your maximum concentration and attention, so get ready, it will be interesting.Features:
  • Funny arcade game
  • 3D graphics
  • Interesting gameplay
  • Multiplatform (Mac, Windows, Linux)

Your task is to move the cube as far as possible. This is not so simple as it might seem at first glance. On the way, you will be blocked by various obstacles, which you will have to deftly dodge. If you come in contact with them, you will immediately lose and then you will have to start all over again. The game has nice three-dimensional graphics and convenient and simple control. Gameplay is pretty fun, especially if you have friends with whom you can compete. You can also try and collect all the achievements, which in the game quite a lot.
